translations: 挽歌，悼文；表达哀伤（或痛惜）之情的言辞；抱怨
对……感到悲痛，对……表示失望；抱怨

sentences.sentence: Another piece went right through a backyard trampoline, evoking a mother's lament, "Those damned kids ..."
sentences.translation: 另一块碎片正好打穿一张摆在后院的蹦床，惹得那家母亲哀叹：“这些可恶的孩子……”

sentences.sentence: Another piece went right through a backyard trampoline, evoking a mother's lament, "Those damned kids ..."
sentences.translation: 另一块碎片正好打穿一张摆在后院的蹦床，惹得那家母亲哀叹：“这些可恶的孩子……”

sentences.sentence: Yet Walmart's year-over-year online sales only grew 7 percent, leading its CEO to lament "Growth here is too slow."
sentences.translation: 然而，沃尔玛的网上销售同比仅增长了7%，导致其总裁哀叹“增长太慢”。
